1406370.name: Fantasy Grounds - Landlubber's Voyage 1!
1406370.description:
Landlubber's Voyage 1!

Take your adventures to the open sea with this 25 Token pack filled with Sailing ships and other vessels!

This product includes:
  • Galley_Blue[boat,ship,sailship,sea,vessel]
  • Galley_Red[boat,ship,sailship,sea,vessel]
  • Galley_white[boat,ship,sailship,sea,vessel]
  • Galley_Yellow[boat,ship,sailship,sea,vessel]
  • Glider_Flyingfish_Blue[boat,ship,sailship,sea,vessel]
  • Glider_Flyingfish_red[boat,ship,sailship,sea,vessel]
  • Glider_Flyingfish_white[boat,ship,sailship,sea,vessel]
  • Glider_Flyingfish_Yellow[boat,ship,sailship,sea,vessel]
  • Merchant_blue[boat,ship,sailship,sea,vessel]
  • Merchant_red[boat,ship,sailship,sea,vessel]
  • Merchant_White[boat,ship,sailship,sea,vessel]
  • Merchant_Yellow[boat,ship,sailship,sea,vessel]
  • Pumpboat[boat,ship,sailship,sea,vessel]
  • Pumpboat_Sail[boat,ship,sailship,sea,vessel]
  • Raft_Bone_Tiger[boat,ship,sailship,sea,vessel]
  • Raft_Bone_Zebra[boat,ship,sailship,sea,vessel]
  • Raft_poor_Blue[boat,ship,sailship,sea,vessel]
  • Raft_poor_red[boat,ship,sailship,sea,vessel]
  • Raft_poor_White[boat,ship,sailship,sea,vessel]
  • Raft_poor_Yellow[boat,ship,sailship,sea,vessel]
  • Sleek_blue[boat,ship,sailship,sea,vessel]
  • Sleek_red[boat,ship,sailship,sea,vessel]
  • Sleek_white[boat,ship,sailship,sea,vessel]
  • Sleek_Yellow[boat,ship,sailship,sea,vessel]
  • Submarine_Barrel[boat,ship,sailship,sea,vessel]
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Kevin Doswell
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
